official_title: Expressing support for designation of February 8, 2010, as "Boy Scouts of America Day" in celebration of the 100th anniversary.

summary.text: Expresses support for the designation of Boy Scouts of America Day in celebration of its 100th anniversary.

titles.title: Expressing support for designation of February 8, 2010, as "Boy Scouts of America Day" in celebration of the 100th anniversary.
